title: Koisuru Boukun
synopsis: Tetsuhiro Morinaga is in love with his upperclassman Souichi Tatsumi. He even manages to confess his love. Too bad it turns out that Tatsumi is an aggressive, self-centered, and outspoken homophobe.
voices: ['Midorikawa, Hikaru', 'Toriumi, Kousuke', 'Miyata, Kouki', 'Kyo, Ayaka', 'Sugita, Tomokazu', 'Hirakawa, Daisuke']
